default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: M...B...CC... is that right? I've heard of your place! There are a lot of Sinners there. Enough chitchat, let me in!

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: Ah... strength is like collecting garbage. The more you collect, you stronger you become.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: Yes. As expected, it's better to be stronger. The earlier I get off work, the better I sleep.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Huh? This hammer seems lighter!

default.title: Level Start
default.text: I bet I can find a lot of treasures on this trip.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: What's that thing called... from the book... oh right! Hardness triumphs over softness, strength over feebleness!

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Run! They're catching up!

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Stop!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: You are not allowed to go there...

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: The people from the procurement office always spend money like crazy. I'll have to give them a talking to. Money doesn't grow on trees, you know.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: Want to come play DisChess? They're not here, so let's just play with the two of us. Chief, don't go! Try it out! It's fun!

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: "Don't treat others' gossip as gifts, because you're not a garbage collector." Huh? Is this line in the book making fun of me, Chief? No? Good, I'll write it down then.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: Slaying Corruptors is my job, but enjoying life is more important.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: Chief, did you stay up late again? You can't keep doing that! Young people need their sleep.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: Compared to where I used to live, this place is too fancy! I'd rather sleep in the hallway and give my bed to the kids from the Syndicate.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: Chief, since we're so close already, I'll cut to the chaseâ€”when will the balcony I applied for be approved?

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Where are we going today to scavenge... no, I mean, to catch Sinners?

default.title: Idle
default.text: When can we go to the Rust together again? There's a new shipment over there. I hear there are some light track construction materials. If we scavenge some, we can make a fortune!

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Oh yeah! Right there! Harder! Wow... feels so good...

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Chief, the weather is so nice today! Won't you come along?

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Harvest time! I can't fit everything in my cart!

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Huh? I'm the only one left standing here? No! That's so boring!

gritty_detour.title: Level Up
gritty_detour.text: Oh my Chief, you are just too kind.

gritty_detour.title: Obtain Attire
gritty_detour.text: Chief? What a coincidence! Never expected to see you here! Me? Argh, it is so frigging hot out here that my engine broke down. But, no worries, just sit here and wait a bit. I'll get us a ride.

gritty_detour.title: Greeting
gritty_detour.text: You awake? Don't worry about it. Just go back to sleep if you feel like it. I'll let you know when I get us a ride.

gritty_detour.title: Ordinary Contact 1
gritty_detour.text: Hey! Over here! Can you take us for a ride? Argh... Sped by again. Gosh, why are people so heartless nowadays?

gritty_detour.title: Ordinary Contact 2
gritty_detour.text: Just let me know if you are hungry or thirsty and don't act tough, okay? My car broke down, but all my stuff is intact. I've got enough food and water to last us for quite some time!

gritty_detour.title: Idle
gritty_detour.text: Chief, Chief? Are you asleep? Are you having heatstroke? Wait up, stay put. I'll get you a wet towel.

gritty_detour.title: Annoyed
gritty_detour.text: So you're saying, we should put up a bigger sign? Good thinking. I'm on it!

gritty_detour.title: Special Attention
gritty_detour.text: You're back! Told you there can't be any town nearby in the middle of nowhere. You're not built for these scorching temperatures. Don't be too hard on yourself, just rest up and leave it to me.
